tagline: Where Your Child Thrives After School

director.name: Taruna Gupta
director.title: Director & Founder
director.bio: As a mother of two boys and with over 4 years of dedicated childcare experience since 2021, I founded Symphony Childcare in 2024 to bring the same personal care I give my own children to Fremont families. With my Bachelor's in Computer Applications and required California early childhood education credentials, I combine modern innovation with proven care practices. I personally cook fresh Indian vegetarian meals and genuinely care about each and every child's individual growth and happiness.
qualifications: California state-required early childhood education credentials
Mother of two boys - personal parenting experience
Personally cooks fresh Indian vegetarian meals
